chapter: Diseases of the eye and adnexa
block: Disorders of eyelid, lacrimal system and orbit
category: Disorders of eyelid in diseases classified elsewhere

inclusion: Involvement of eyelid in: herpesviral [herpes simplex] infection
Involvement of eyelid in: molluscum contagiosum
